articles.title: Sydney Sweeney's American Eagle Ads Attracts Trump and Knockoff Cries - WWD
articles.description: American Eagle Outfitters' stock rose 23.5 percent, closing at $13.28 Monday.
articles.content:
The controversy swirling around American Eagle Outfitters‘ “Great Jeans” campaign with Sydney Sweeney does not appear to be subsiding.

articles.author: Sara  Moniuszko
articles.title: More early stage colon cancers found in people aged 45-49 due to more screenings, research shows - CBS News
articles.description: As more people aged 45-49 are getting screened for colon cancer, more early stage diagnoses are being made, according to new research from the American Cancer Society.
articles.content:
